definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Visa already dominates the U.S. debit-card market.
sentences.chinese: 維薩已經壟斷了美國的借記卡市場。

sentences.english: Then there was Novi Sad – "too beautiful".
sentences.chinese: 然後還有諾維薩德，“太美了。”

sentences.english: The last summit meeting in the Novo Wei Sade 3 years ago, held in Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 上一次領導人會議於3年前在塞爾維亞諾維薩德舉行。
1973年出生於南斯拉夫的諾維薩德。

sentences.english: A complex and aged dry white made from the estate best Ortrugo and Malvasia grapes.
sentences.chinese: 一個老年份的乾白，特選奧圖戈和瑪爾維薩葡萄。

sentences.english: And now, I was back in Visakhapatnam, almost ten years later.
sentences.chinese: 現在，近十年以後，我又回到了維薩卡帕特南市。

sentences.english: That'll be fine. We accept Master Card and Visa.
sentences.chinese: 沒有問題，我們接受萬事達和維薩卡。

sentences.english: We accept American express, Visa and Mastered.
sentences.chinese: 我們接受美國運通卡，維薩卡，萬事達卡。
